documents.document: @dotcode @climagic My reaction exactly
@DazTheGooner @charltonbrooker Yeah I realised how dumb that was after I sent it. Doh!
@charltonbrooker Yeah that's what millennials did 100 years ago, didn't they?
@SusanCalman #CalmanForDoctorWho and Tom Hardy would be your other companion! I expect you'd be a dab hand with a sonic screwdriver.
@LabourEoin Hah! Right now, Labour can't make a success of anything.
The USA is the worst country in the world, for everyone who doesn't live there. But Trump is fixing that.
@LabourEoin The tories won the election by the people's will. Why don't you respect that and agree with everything they say and do?
@qikipedia No, a group of unicorns is called a fantasy.
@laurenduca Yeah and with his "bare hands". Watch out, next time he'll wear mittens.
@pihentagy @climagic @bartonski use quotes : function box() { t="$1xxxx";c=${2:-=}; echo "${t//?/$c}"; echo "$c $1 $c"; echo "${t//?/$c}"; }
So Prince Charles is to contribute to Radio 4's Just A Minute. Surely it should be I'm Sorry, I Haven't A Clue?
@GNRailUK The 17:52 Kings Cross to Royston. It was supposed to stop at Hatfield and WGC.
@GNRailUK and I'm not the only one affected. I talked to five other passengers in the same situation.
@GNRailUK you changed the destination of my train with no notice, and it didn't stop at my station. I will now be late home.
@adamjohnsonNYC you're just jealous that the writer can read the minds of thousands of dead people
@ndw So, nothing much has changed then.
Reading comments below articles today, I think we may have to replace Hitler with Trump in Godwin's Law https://t.co/EyDvuhVyD5
@theshowstoppers the fitness studio is infested with cockroaches or the ladies are transsexual
@showstoppers the fitness studio is infested with cockroaches
@kaveh1000 Yes but there's only one "Uncle Kaveh" :)
@SusanCalman @sohotheatre I already have a ticket *skips around living room*
I've just been bowled over by Sarah Jane Morris and Antonio Forcione at #kingsplace . #instantfan
It's been a while since I saw @thenatalies and they're as brilliant as ever #livemusic Check out https://t.co/cBoRHLi4mB for local music
@NeilClark66 Please let us know how we can donate.
@adamfowleruk Hehehe. Gotta love @twitter for a tweet about infinite recursion including a link to itself. So meta-recursive!
Thanks to all the organisers and presenters at @xmlsummerschool for a grezt few days. Lots of ideas learned exchanged and discussed.
@GWRHelp Hi Grant. It was the 16:22 Paddington to Great Malvern, carriage A. Both the heating and aircon were on.
The view from my room of Oxford spires and roofs. Where's Lyra and Roger? @xmlsummerschool #oxford https://t.co/BfINZSBDHR
The view from my room of Oxford spires and roofs. Where's Lyra and Roger? @xmlsummerschool #oxford
My team and I are on our way to @xmlsummerschool and we're excited! #xmlgeeks
On a train on one of the hottest days of the year, and the heating is on! #sweltering @gwruk
@mrchrisaddison I found a pic of you trying out the latest headphone technology. https://t.co/IqMkIo8KHq
@squil Not entirely, but it contributes
@squil i do that on the train.
@kevinfolta @TheSciBabe @maryleechin @thefoodbabe So if you want to eat it, but can't pronounce it, just give it a shorter name. #logic
.@JaclynGlenn great video, enhanced I think by the irony of the Google ad for the Free Messianic Bible. LOL https://t.co/d5XUOjXSl7
@SusanCalman @lfenner I hear your pain. And I like it.
@TheSciBabe I'm surprised you're still alive and not pickled in alcohol #RNC
@adamjohnsonNYC What, Trump's madness is caused by porphyria?
@dotcode Congratulations! All the best to you both.
Some clarification on the current state of affairs for MPs involved in the #brexit vote. https://t.co/FnbrKPVkht
@TomiLahdesmaki @derivadow Scotlondon will fight with Europe against the fascist Engnolondonland in the coming European War
@digitalsci Did you make the mistake of only polling people who think critically about stuff? What about the ignorant and gullible?
@LabourEoin Or a motion of no confidence in the labour MPs who lost the election by attacking their elected leader?
@LabourEoin How about a motion of no confidence in the New Labour MPs who helped the banks rip off the UK public & condoned an illegal war?
An independent Scotland within the EU will fight with Europe against the fascist Engnolondonland in the coming European War #EURefResults
Those of you who voted #Brexit - Think you're hard done by now? Just wait till you find yourself living in Engnolondonland! #EURefResults
It's bucketing down right now. For the first time I wished my train to slow down. Now sitting in waiting room rather than walk in the deluge
@joewass @Crossref @nature Thanks @EvoMRI odd our source XML is correct. I've asked our production team to resend to CrossRef, should fix it
@dotcode I can proudly boast to my friends that I know the guy who scored 80% !!! on the company H&S course #limeliteofastar

. @medialens @guardian simply forgot Tony Blair's correct title "War Criminal".
Man with horse head and banana costume in Leicester Square is surprisingly good singer/guitarist with neighs https://t.co/CRWgdfxVCI
Yet another great #xmllondon conference! Good variety and high quality presentations and much food for thought.
Jim Mangiafico shows search interface to the National Archives legislation XML DB, using "banana" as search term.#xmllondon geekily happy
OASIS CALS table models being discussed at #XMLLONDON - feeling geekily happy!
OH in London "I do believe women should exist." I'm hoping he was just distracted from finishing his sentence...
@aardrian Good XML should convey both structure and meaning. For example: <name><forename>Paul</forename><surname>Donohoe</surname></name>
@aardrian as opposed to XML, which conveys semantic meaning but not presentational purpose. You might guess, I'm an XML developer :)
@aardrian Sorry I didn't mean to sound grumpy. But my point is that HTML is presentational and elements convey purpose but not meaning
.@aardrian NO. HTML "semantic" markup shows the *purpose* of the content, but NOT its *meaning*.
Back home in Blighty and enjoying the cool breeze.
.@ozjimbob @IanMulvany and what about all those humans who don't play chess?
You get what you pay for: "laundry delivered after 6pm"; it's after 11pm and I'm still waiting. #shitservice
Hilarious how bad waiters are in this hotel restaurant in Mumbai. People are waiting for a table and we finished 30 mins ago #shitservice
